text_block_list.text:
Biwa Hayahide is a racer who loves<n>formulating theories on
how events<n>will play out. But sometimes, pure<n>chance
dictates the outcome—much<n>like our chance meeting.
One day, while walking behind the<n>school...

Something falls from above. It glitters<n>in the light, reflecting
the setting sun.
I'm so sorry! You're not hurt, are<n>you?

I hear a sharp, clear voice overhead.<n>Looking up, there's an
Umamusume<n>poking out from a classroom window.

Yes! My apologies—I was lost in<n>thought, and they must've
fallen off.
choice_data_list: No problem, I'll bring them up to you!

text_block_list.text: You will? That'd be much<n>appreciated!

I carry the glasses up to the<n>classroom where the student is<n>
waiting.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Good... The hinges move without<n>issue. And the lenses
appear to be<n>unblemished.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
These are tailor-made for racing.<n>Naturally, their material is
able to<n>withstand quite a bit of wear and tear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Meaning, in theory, the fall from only<n>a second-story
window should not<n>damage them.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, the possibility remained<n>that a runner might
inadvertently<n>trample them. Your assistance,<n>though,
reduced that chance to zero.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You have my thanks. Now I will not be<n>hindered tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Well, with that badge on your collar, I<n>suspect you're a
trainer. Then I'm<n>sure you are well aware of the<n>tryouts
tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's where Umamusume aiming to<n>debut will exhibit their
abilities to<n>trainers in the hopes of being<n>scouted.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And in the tenth race, I—Biwa<n>Hayahide—will be participating.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Rather, I must participate. Thereis something I have to accomplish inthe Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So, needless to say, I will seize this<n>opportunity for
victory—and my chance<n>to make my debut.

Although she speaks calmly, I feel<n>her unwavering
confidence, her eyes<n>smoldering with iron will.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I suppose... I can reveal one thing.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In tomorrow's race, I'll stay near the<n>lead until the final
corner. The front<n>pack will be tightly grouped together.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Following the last turn, I'll pass them<n>from outside.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Then I will gain a lead of no less than<n>ten lengths—and place
first.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That is the result I've derived from<n>my calculations.
Whether it proves<n>true or not... you should confirm<n>
tomorrow with your own eyes.

Biwa Hayahide's calculations are<n>both composed and
daring at the<n>same time. But will the outcome really<n>be as
she predicts?

Having grown curious, I come to see<n>the tryouts the next
day to see how<n>her races pan out.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers are in a heated battle right<n>out of the gate! The
spotlight's on<n>Biwa Hayahide, who's gotten a<n>favorable
position in the front!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: All according to my predictions.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The front pack is heading into the<n>third corner! It's a close
fight between<n>the leaders!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Three... two... one.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Time to confirm my calculations!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're out of the corner and into the<n>final straight! Biwa
Hayahide comes in<n>from the outside! Biwa Hayahide<n>
takes the lead! She's two lengths<n>ahead! Now three!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Biwa Hayahide places first! She<n>wins it by a landslide!
What an<n>overwhelming victory!

I feel a chill run down my spine as I<n>watch Biwa
Hayahide's prediction<n>play out word for word!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was some show, Biwa<n>Hayahide! You had plenty
to<n>spare—almost like you had it all<n>planned out.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text: Hm? Hey, look! Is that who I think it<n>is?!

Such formidable abilities should be<n>getting Biwa Hayahide
scouting<n>requests from all sides. But suddenly,<n>an
unexpected visitor arrives...
Nice run.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you, Brian. Here to spectate?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I was just passing by.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I knew it! It's the Beast, Narita Brian!<n>I've heard she's
pretty elusive, but<n>here she is—right in front of me!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Holy hotcakes, what am I waitin' for!<n>Brian! I'd love to
have a talk!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Tch, the rats are squeaking... Later,<n>Sis.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: One moment, Brian. You appear...<n>thinner than usual.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Are you not meeting your dietary<n>requirements? Is your
nutritional<n>intake sufficient?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Lay off of me. I'm eating just fine.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hm. I think I understand. The recent<n>changes to the cafeteria
menu are not<n>to your liking.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You've always been far too picky an<n>eater. Listen, our
energy consumption<n>is exceptional, and—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Ugh! You're so bigheaded about<n>everything!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What?! M-my head is NOT large! To<n>the contrary, it is of
average<n>proportions... Brian!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Goodness... She can be so stubborn.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Wait up, Brian! The Triple Crown sure<n>would look glorious
on you! And I can<n>help you get it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There is still room to improve my<n>theories.

It turns out that Biwa Hayahide, who<n>runs with calculated
precision, is also<n>the older sister of the racer dubbed<n>the
"Beast."

Strangely, I find myself drawn to her. I<n>feel a growing
curiosity within me,<n>wanting to know more about this<n>
intriguing runner.
